sentences.sContent: We need two new Classes at either end of the inheritance hierarchy to do this.
sentences.sContent_eng: We need two new Classes at either end of the inheritance hierarchy to do this.
sentences.sCn: 在继承层次的每个端点，我们需要两个新类来完成这个。

sentences.sContent: Thus you have only one hierarchy of loggers for all users. You lose isolation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus you have only one hierarchy of loggers for all users. You lose isolation.
sentences.sCn: 这样，所有的用户只有一个层次结构，您会失去隔离性。

sentences.sContent: If you chose that one, the project hierarchy should look like Figure 8 after you have created the project.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you chose that one, the project hierarchy should look like Figure 8 after you have created the project.
sentences.sCn: 如果您从中选择了一个，那么在您创建项目时，项目层级结构应该如图 8 所示。
